Extends Kiwi.Entity

)
Kiwi.GameObjects.StatelessParticles public

Defined in src\gameobject.js:10

Parameters:

  • state Kiwi.State

    : the state to which the game object belongs

  • atlas Kiwi.Textures.TextureAtlas

    : the texture for the particle object

  • x Number

    : the x position of the game object

  • y Number

    : the y position of the game object

    : the particle configuration object

setConfig

(
  • config
  • doGenerate
  • doUniforms
)
public

Defined in src\gameobject.js:330

Sets the configuration object and optionally regenerates particles and sets runtime properties.

Parameters:

  • config Object

    : the new configuration object

  • doGenerate Boolean

    : immediately regenerate particles

  • doUniforms Boolean

    : apply runtime properties

startEmitting

(
  • loop
  • removeOnComplete
  • numParts
)
public

Defined in src\gameobject.js:249

Starts the system emitting particles. Particles will be regenerated each time.

Parameters:

  • loop Boolean

    : Set to true for continuous looping. Overrides and updates the config loop setting.

  • removeOnComplete Boolean

    : if not looping, then the gameobject will destroy itself after one full emission cycle.

  • numParts Number

    : the number of particles to generate, set on the config object - if not provided the current config value will be used

stopEmitting

(
  • immediate
  • remove
)
public

Defined in src\gameobject.js:278

Stops the system from emitting particles.

Parameters:

  • immediate Boolean

    : stops the emitter and removes any existing particles.

  • remove Boolean

    : if true the gameobject will mark itself for removal either immediately, or after a completed cycle.

Properties

defaultConfig

Object

Defined in src\gameobject.js:74

The default configuration object.

drawingVectors

Array private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:173

An array of vectors that conatains generated velocities if useDrawingVectors is true. Used by the particle editor.

loopLength

Number private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:229

The maximum loop length of the system.

nextRandomIndex

Number private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:221

The index of the next random number in useRandoms. Used by the particle editor.

numRandoms

Number private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:213

The number of random numbers to generate if useRandoms is true.

randoms

Array private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:197

If useRandoms is true, This array will contain pregenerate random numbers which will be used every new generation refresh. Used by the particle editor.

rnd

Function private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:189

A function delegated to return a random number. Used by the particle editor.

started

Boolean public

Defined in src\gameobject.js:155

Returns whether the particle system has started emitting

useDrawingVectors

Boolean private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:181

If true, velocity vectors will be stored on particle generation. Used by the particle editor.

useRandoms

Boolean private

Defined in src\gameobject.js:205

If true, pregenerate random numbers. Used by the particle editor.
